paper_abstract: By using a continuation theorem based on coincidence degree theory, we establish easily verifiable criteria for the existence of multiple periodic solutions in delayed Gause-type ratio-dependent predator-prey systems with numerical responses. As corollaries, some applications are listed. (c) 2007 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Multiple periodic solutions in delayed Gause-type ratio-dependent predator-prey systems with non-monotonic numerical responses
